turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi there, what Can I do for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello, I would like to order a few pizzas from Bella Luna, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure! What would you like!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order one one pizza but with just with chorizo and onions.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like another pizza with chicken barbecue and onion.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The third pizza, I would like the third pizza to be with pepperoni, onions, mushrooms, and olives.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sorry, can I change my order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you please delete that order, sorry? I 'd like to order instead of four pizzas, I would like to order three pizzas instead.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: NO problem!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want my one pizza to be chicken barbecue with onions.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want my second pizza to be to have pepperoni, onions, and olives. And I would like the third pizza to be a white pizza with white sauce, mozzarella cheese, and focaccia cheese. And I would like the three pizzas to be gluten-free crust if that's possible, and medium.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay! Sure! Let me make sure all those toppings are available.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sure.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The 3rd pizza you'd asked for seems to have a type of cheese that Bella Luna does not offer.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. I'll just have it with just mozzarella cheese, then.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay! let me write that down.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright let me state those pizzas back to you one by one.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sure.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You'd like 3 Medium Pizzas on Gluten free crust. the first one is a Chicken BBQ with onion.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great thank you!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and another pizza with Pepperoni, onion and olives

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay , great!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The last pizza will be a simple Cheese pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great! thanks so much for confirming.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, no problem.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Let me send those three orders to Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The total for you order will be $28.99.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I charge it on my credit card?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, we will charge it to the card on file. Give me just one moment.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order has been sent to Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect. How long would it take?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It should be ready for pickup in 25 min.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, prefect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is that all for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that would be all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, thank you so much!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: have a great day!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you so Thanks. You, too. Bye-bye.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Bye.
